name: Flock (shoze, Julien Mulard, JoAMD)
description:
Quarantine Jam

A 60 hour game jam. Theme - "Pack", or "Ndab"

#NdabJam

**** Known bug: After finishing the last level and clicking the "Next Level" button, you'll get back to the title screen, as intended, but sheeps will be frozen in place for both the title screen and the Freeplay mode. 

**** QuickFix: Click on the "Start !" button on the title screen to load the tutorial.  You can now go back to the title screen using the home button on top of the screen, and everything should be back to normal.

Game description:

Use your herding staff to nudge the sheep into the pen. Don't let them fall of the mountain!

Instructions:

Classic game:
Moving the mouse move the herding staff. Sheeps are afraid of it and will flee in the opposite direction. Guide them to the pen. When you have gathered the maximum amount you can, click the button on the sign to finish the level.

Note: If all sheeps die, press the button on the sign to reload the level.

Freeplay:
Play with twenty ship on mountain free of any kind of obstacle until you've mastered hearding, lost all your sheeps or simply want to stop.

Credits:

Art and Game Design - Galit "shoze" Weisberg

Programming - Joel Antony Joseph

Programming and Sound Design/Music - Julien Mulard

Ressources:

* Sheep sound effects from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
* Font - Sigmar
